explains: adj. 有利的；良好的；赞成的，赞许的；讨人喜欢的
wordGroup: favorable location 地利；位置优越
favorable balance of trade 出超，贸易顺差
under favorable conditions 在有利的情形下；在适宜的条件下
favorable interest rate 优惠利率
favorable trade balance 贸易顺差；出超

sentences.en: Some plants can even survive in favorable microhabitats above the snow line.
sentences.cn: 有些植物甚至可以在雪线以上的有利的微环境中生存。

sentences.en: Favorable policies are in effect to encourage employees' professional development.
sentences.cn: 这些优惠政策实际上是为了鼓励员工的专业发展。

sentences.en: The book received highly favorable reviews.
